entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
